DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study compare pharmacokinetics profile low dose raltegravir ( RAL ) ( 400mg OD 800mg OD ) standard dose 400mg BID Thai HIV-infected patient .
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty four HIV-infected volunteer stable dos RAL 400 mg BID least 3 month undetectable viral load enrol . On Day 1 , 24 subject attend first intensive PK collection RAL 400 mg BID blood sample draw T = 0.0 , 0.5 , 1.0 , 1.5 , 2.0 , 2.5 , 3.0 , 4.0 , 6.0 , 8.0 , 10.0 , 12.0 hour post medication . All 24 subject randomise ( 1:1 ) either Group A ( RAL 400 mg OD ) Group B ( RAL 800 mg OD ) 14 day . On day 15 , second 24 hour intensive PK carry blood sample drawn . After 2nd intensive PK , subject switch dose regimen . Subjects group A receive RAL 800 mg OD group B receive RAL 400 mg OD another 14 day . On day 29 , third 24 hour intensive PK carry . After 3rd intensive PK , 24 subject switch back initial regimen RAL 400 mg BID .
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Evidence HIV infection Age > 18 year On RAL 400 mg BID contain HAART regimen VL < 50 copy least 3 month enrollment Willing adhere protocol requirement Evidence RAL resistance History RAL allergy Use concomitant medication may interfere pharmacokinetics RAL Current pregnancy lactate plan get pregnant Active drug abuse alcoholic Relevant history current condition , illness might interfere drug absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion .
DOC.keyword: To study pharmacokinetics profile low dose raltegravir ( RAL ) ( 400mg OD 800mg OD ) standard dose 400mg BID Thai HIV-infected patient .
